issue.title: [Python] The pandas.datetime class (import of datetime.datetime) and pandas.np are deprecated
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7528](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7528). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `pd.datetime` was actually just an import from `datetime.datetime`, and is being removed from pandas (to use the stdlib one directly). And `pd.np` was an import of numpy.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7528?focusedCommentId=17011811) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6148
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6148>
